name: AgileHead
overview:
Founded in 2009, AgileHead is a Software Services company targeting Startups. With a startup-friendly work culture and informal processes, AgileHead focuses on getting applications out of the door quickly.

The lightweight methodology AgileHead applies is evolved from its own experience as a web startup. Apart from providing Software Development Services, AgileHead has some products too; Jobhunt (www.jobhunt.in) and Social Ray (www.socialray.org).

AgileHead has a policy of open sourcing most of its applications. Three popular projects are:

  1. AgileFx - O/R Mapper for .Net (http://www.agilefx.org)
  2. Jobhunt - Really simple Job Portal (http://www.jobhunt.in)
  3. Social Ray - Professional Networking (http://www.socialray.org)
